Executive_Summary.Revenue: IBM generated total revenue of $62.75 billion in FY 2024, with a gross profit of $35.55 billion.
Executive_Summary.Profitability: Operating income of $5.9 billion, net income of $6.02 billion, and EBIT of $7.52 billion.
Executive_Summary.Cash_Flow: Strong operating cash flow of $13.45 billion, with solid dividend payouts of $6.15 billion.
Executive_Summary.Balance_Sheet: Total assets of $137.18 billion with substantial goodwill and intangible assets. Debt-to-equity ratio of 4.02.
